From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enter configuration change logger configuration mode, use the **log config** command in archive configuration mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to place the router in configuration change logger configuration mode:

RelatedCmds.description: Suppresses the display of password information in configuration log files.
Enables the logging of configuration changes.
Specifies the maximum number of entries retained in the configuration log.
Enables the sending of notifications of configuration changes to a remote syslog.
Displays entries from the configuration log.
